getRelatedResults

MatchTopicResult getRelatedResults(Collection<String> terms,
                                   long knowledgeBaseID,
                                   int maxTopicNumberToExpand,
                                   boolean perfixMatch)
                                   throws IOException
Get the related results for the searched terms.

Parameters:
terms - the searched terms
knowledgeBaseID - id of the knowledge base where we want to search
maxTopicNumberToExpand - maximum number of the topics we want to get
perfixMatch - specified the search type if it true the search will be prefix search else whole word search
Returns:
the best topics
Throws:
IOException
